text: Star Search Croatia () Season 2 is the second season of the second Croatian version of Pop Idol, broadcast in 2010. Auditions were held in the four biggest cities of the country: Zagreb, Rijeka, Osijek and Split. Tony Cetinski and Goran Lisica returned as judges while Jelena Radan was replaced by Anđa Marić during the auditions. ==Finals elimination chart== {|class="wikitable" align="center" |colspan="2"
